headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CORWIN, DOROTHY J

snippet: CORWIN--Dorothy J. Beloved wife of Dr. Norman D. Corwin of Westwood, NJ, passed away on February 27, 2016. Adored mother of Janice C. Linett, Michael R. Corwin, and Susan C. Yaros. Honored grandmother of Steven Linett, Jenny Linett, Ethan Yaros, and Matthew Yaros. Dorothy, a native New Yorker, attended Bronx High School of Science. She was a cum laude graduate of Jackson (Tufts) College. She attended Columbia University School of Social Work and was awarded the Masters in Social Work degree from the Boston University School of Social Work. As the children grew she found her true love, books, at the Westwood Public Library where she worked many years. She and her husband enjoyed traveling, especially when chaperoning the Westwood High School band on their European trips. The couple were especially happy to have made it to the Pyramids and the Great Wall of China. The family is honoring her wish for a private funeral service at Cedar Park Cemetery in Paramus, NJ. In lieu of flowers, please make a donation to your favorite charity or support your local public library. Lastly, in the words of Jorge Luis Borges hanging on a wall at her home, "I had always imagined paradise as a kind of library." guttermanandmusicant.com. 1/3
